short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Presents a random dad joke when opened. You can get more jokes with the click of a button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The single purpose of this extension is to present random dad jokes, Each time the extension is opened a new dad joke will be presented, the user can also click on a button to get a new joke.
